archimate:Requirement.name: Communication plan is created
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Our communication plan needs to be comprehensive to secure wide adoption of the repository. Spontaneous adoption of any new tool is typically low in our company. Current thinking: * Repository needs to be promoted - e.g. Workplace * There should be trainings on Teams * We should personally approach known key contacts in sales/customer teams to recruit them to use the repository and spread the word of it - think key users * We should build a community around the repository - e.g. Teams, and make sure the community is live with content. We can also use this to get feedback and new questions.
